pageProps.title: What your body goes through when you have an erection (it's interesting!)
pageProps.metaDesc:
Although many erections are caused by sexual arousal, such as watching a sexy television show or fantasising, many erections appear to happen for no apparent reason.

So, if you had an erection in an unusual or embarrassing situation, such as the middle of a really boring history lesson, there's no need to worry.
